#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

ll kadane(int a[],int n){
ll max_so_far=0;
ll max_ending_here=0;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
    max_ending_here+=a[i];
    if(max_ending_here<0)
    max_ending_here=0;
    if(max_so_far<=max_ending_here)
        max_so_far=max_ending_here;
}
return max_so_far;
}



int main()
{
    int t;// test case
    int n,c,x;
    int p[100000];//10^5
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&x);
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&c);
            p[i]=c-x;
        }
        ll ans= kadane(p,n);
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }


    return 0;
}
